markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Fey's Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=3819) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 141</row>

**Archetype** [Living Vessel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=188)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Living Vessel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3815)

</column>

---

You connect with the fey trickster within yourself to create whimsical illusory duplicates that distract your foes. This has the effects of [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197).
name: Fey's Trickery
